item.title: As we optimized cost AWS infrastructure utilization
item.description: Preface Been written system of auto-scaling which managed up to 600 instances EC2. Product owner was not satisfied cost of this infrastructure, the development team was assigned task - decrease cost. A little bit about project: it’s cloud service which processes vast amounts of user data every day on schedule. Solution using faster machines to reduce the uptime distributing tasks on heterogeneous machines depending on the heaviness of the task using SPOT requests prediction of the time required to complete the task The analysis of old solution Dispatcher is load balancer, it assign tasks according to the exists EC2 instances Processor or creates new instances if need.
